titles.title: Relating to a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Mr. Johnston offerred a privileged resolution addressing a question of the privileges of the House with respect to matters currently before the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct and asked for its immediate consideration.
Mr. Armey moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 170, 9 Present (Roll no. 287).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/27/1996--Introduced. Instructs the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to transmit the remaining charges against Speaker Newt Gingrich to the outside counsel for his investigation and recommendations.
